Topographic Residue Groups

Alfa Helix Structure (HEX) All residues in alfa helix conformation
Beta Sheet Structure (SHT) All residues in beta sheet conformation
TURN Structure (TRN) All residues in reverse turn conformation
Random Coil (RCL) All residues in loops regions (Residues in TRN are excluded)
Internal (INT) Represents the all internal residues in the protein.
Superficial (SUP) Represents all superficial residues contained in the protein.
Whole Protein (PRT) The whole protein

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
